catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 630
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: octagonal dish with central design of two Chinese children by a fence in a garden; border with circles pierced with wave-like design in alternating squares with geometric and foliage designs in blue, gold, red, and white
medium: Imari ware; porcelain with underglaze cobalt blue, overglaze enamels, and gold
title: Dish with two Chinese boys in a garden
